entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
